title: Northwest Center for Natural Medicine
cleaned_text: Located in Olympia, Washington, the Northwest Center for Natural Medicine provides a unique approach to health care by integrating Naturopathic medicine, Traditional Chinese medicine and conventional western medicine. Through this integration, our physicians create a comprehensive, customized and research based health program for each individual. The focus in our clinic is not to just overcome the disease and make the symptoms go away but to address the underlying cause of the disease so as to restore balance and optimize the body's functions, so our patients can live to their fullest potential.
